Name: Khartoum
Description: The capital region, the political and administrative center of Sudan.

Name: Northern
Description: Region known for the Nile and ancient Nubian history.

Name: Red Sea
Description: A coastal region known for its Red Sea coastline and ports.

Name: Kordofan
Description: A central region known for agriculture and pastoralism.

Name: Darfur
Description: Region known for its complex ethnic diversity and past conflicts.

Name: Blue Nile
Description: Region located along the Blue Nile River, known for its mountainous terrain.

Name: Sennar
Description: A region known for its agriculture, particularly around the Sennar Dam.

Name: Gadarif
Description: An eastern region with a strong agricultural economy.
